name: PolyZap
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: PolyZap is a Next-gen Layer 2 DEX and Yield Farm. Trade with low cost at lightning-fast speeds with close-to-zero gas fees. PolyZap has Fixed supply, Unique Burning Mechanisms and On-Chain Referral Program on Polygon (Matic) Network. PolyZap has Zap farm and Zap Cloud pools where you can earn $PZAP the fuel of PolyZap eco by staking LP tokens and Other Tokens you already have.
